EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t Call Me Shirley, but Do Watch ‘Airplane!’ from Your Airplane ✈️
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Movie Recommendations to Stream to Your Aircraft, Brought to You by Honeywell
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, So many movies, so little time. Honeywell's JetWave <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/wifithatflies]]>, which powers Jet ConneX, means never having to limit your viewing opportunities. Here's a list <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/blogs/2017/march/six-flicks-for-inflight-popcorn-munchers]]> of some great movies you can stream right now from the comfort of your seat.
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
